thread.title: Extended Trailer for The Flash Midseason Premiere
thread.title_full: Extended Trailer for The Flash Midseason Premiere

author: Spencer Perry
title: Extended Trailer for The Flash Midseason Premiere
text:
SHARE Extended trailer for The Flash midseason premiere 
The CW has released an extended trailer for the upcoming midseason premiere of The Flash . Check out The Flash midseason premiere trailer below! 
Titled “Borrowing Problems from the Future,” Episode 3.10 is set to premiere Tuesday, January 24 and is described as follows: 
“Barry is tormented by his vision of the future where Iris is murdered by Savitar. When a criminal named Plunder (guest star Stephen Huszar) shows up in Central City, Barry recalls the villain’s presence in his vision of the future and fears that if he catches Plunder, it will cement Iris’ fate. Confused about Barry’s hesitation to stop Plunder, Wally decides to step in as Kid Flash. Caitlin offers Julian a job.” 
RELATED: Rick Cosnett Returning to The Flash as Eddie Thawne 
The Flash stars Grant Gustin as Barry Allen/The Flash, Candice Patton as Iris West, Danielle Panabaker as Caitlin Snow, Carlos Valdes as Cisco Ramo, Tom Cavanagh as Dr. Harrison Wells and Jesse L. Martin as Detective Joe West. Season 2 of the series also introduced Keiynan Lonsdale as Wally West and the Earth-2 version of The Flash as played by John Wesley Shipp (who also played Barry’s father, Henry Allen).
